DOC.brief_title: Development Gourmet Medical Cooking Workshop Lifestyle Changing Its Affect Perimenopausal Women
DOC.detailed_description: Participants randomly assign dietary consultation-only control group gourmet medical cooking workshop . The workshop consist 9 lesson follow lesson : introduction , fat , phytoestrogens , carbohydrates fiber , calcium low calorie diet , party 's recipe , shop farewell dinner . All lesson start half hour theoretical introduction , follow 2.5 hour `` hand '' session supervision medical chef . The study population include healthy woman attend menopause clinic . 72 patient recruit randomly divide two group : intervention group 36 commence workshop 2007 control group 36 take part dietitian consulting session . During 2008 control group commence workshop add study group .
